message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to make a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.
